redirect.subline: Register and leave us your message. We will get back to you as soon as possible. Go to registration

rejection.rejection: Sorry, we could not respond to your request within the chat time. Please register and leave us your message. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

successOverlay.headline: You have successfully deleted your account from Online Advice & Help.

write.overlayCopy: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

copy.title: Perhaps one of the following points will help you with the wording:
copy.facts:
• On which topic would you like more information or advice?
  • What is your current situation?
  • What's on your mind?
  • Do you have a specific question or maybe you don't know exactly what could help you yourself?

400.description:
Something went wrong. Please check your URL again, it should look like this:

[beratungsstelle].onlineberatung.net

twoFactorAuth.subtitle: Use another app to log in with your Online Advice & Help account. This will make your account more secure from possible unauthorized access.
